body.p:
Bowling Green Ky Mch 23/61
Chas Milliken Esqr
Dr Sir

You are authorized to sign our names to a petition to the Governor of Ky asking him to remit a fine imposed on Jno Alexander of $20 -- &c at the last term of Simpson Equity & Criminal Court -- We believe the fine ought not to be collected of him

yrs &c --
B. C. Grider
Wm V Loving
